title: ‘Documentary Now!’ Review: The Comfort We’ve Been Waiting For
description: IFC’s affectionate sendups of famous documentaries return after a three-year hiatus.
dc:creator: Mike Hale
media:description: The new season of “Documentary Now!” includes a spoof of “My Octopus Teacher” called “My Monkey Grifter” (with Jamie Demetriou, left, and Fred Armisen).
